======Sometimes burst if marines are this close.======

= Description =

Every think, there's a 10% chance that the egg will start to burst if marines are this close. Thinks are usually about every 2 seconds.

See also: <!--[asw_egg_always_burst_distance]-->[[asw_egg_always_burst_distance.wiki|asw_egg_always_burst_distance]].
